response.overview: After a hard fought battle, Mr Piggy is greeted to a superfan named "Chica" who would like to join the team. In the midst of this, the brother of Astaroth, Black Manta, kidnaps a close friend of Mr Piggys in hopes of revenge for what he did to his brother. Piggy is now given the task to choose between friends, newcomers, and his own morals.
response.tagline: REVENGE DRIVES YOU TO GREAT LENGTHS.
response.title: Mr Piggy 2: Testing of Morals
